name: Path T
title: Pathological T
notes:
**Note 1:**  TNM does not include a Tis or TX category for melanoma of mucosa of head and neck sites. Tis and TX are mapped to NA and TNM stage group is derived as NA.

**Note 2:**  TNM does not include a T1 or T2 category for mucosal melanoma of head and neck sites.

**Note 3:**  Assign T3 for extension involving the mucosa only of adjacent sites.  Assign T4a or T4b for extension involving the deeper tissues of the primary or adjacent sites.

**Note 4:**  Assign T3 for localized tumor when no other information is available.
rows:
In situ, intraepithelial, noninvasive

Unknown; extension not stated
Primary tumor cannot be assessed
Not documented in patient record

Tumor limited to the epithelium and/or submucosa 
(mucosal disease)

Tumor confined to mucosa of site of origin

Mucosa only of more than one region of pharynx involved:
    Oropharynx
    Nasopharynx
    Hypopharynx

Mucosa only of pharynx and oral cavity involved

Localized, NOS

Stated as T3

Tumor invades deep soft tissue, cartilage, bone
or overlying skin

Involvement of deep soft tissue or musculature or mucosal involvement of any structure in T3 
Involvement of any of  the structures in T3 WITH fixation

Extension to adjacent structures 

Stated as T4a

Tumor invades any of the following:
Brain
Dura
Skull base
Lower cranial nerves (IX, X, XI, XII)
Masticator space
Carotid artery
Prevertebral space
Mediastinal structures

Contiguous extension:
    Carotid artery (encased)
    Mediastinal structures
   
Stated as T4b
